TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed ReflectionPermissionFlag extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the permitted use of the and namespaces.

span.span: Specifies the permitted use of the and namespaces.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Essa enumeração é usada pelo e classes.This enumeration is used by the and classes. Se nenhum é concedido, reflexão é permitida em todos os tipos e membros, mas as operações de invocação são permitidas somente em tipos visíveis e membros.If no is granted, reflection is allowed on all types and members, but invocation operations are allowed only on visible types and members. Para obter mais informações, consulte [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md) (Considerações sobre segurança relacionadas à reflexão).For more information, see [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md). > [!CAUTION] > Porque pode fornecer acesso a membros de classe particular, é recomendável que você conceda ao código de Internet somente com o sinalizador RestrictedMemberAccess e não com quaisquer outros sinalizadores.Because can provide access to private class members, we recommend that you grant to Internet code only with the RestrictedMemberAccess flag, and not with any other flags. O sinalizador RestrictedMemberAccess foi introduzido no [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)].The RestrictedMemberAccess flag is introduced in the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)]. Para usar esse sinalizador, seu aplicativo deve ter como destino o [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] ou posterior.To use this flag, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. > [!IMPORTANT] > AllFlags não tem o sinalizador RestrictedMemberAccess.AllFlags does not include the RestrictedMemberAccess flag. Para obter uma máscara que inclui todos os sinalizadores nesta enumeração, você deve usar a combinação de AllFlags com RestrictedMemberAccess.To get a mask that includes all flags in this enumeration, you must use the combination of AllFlags with RestrictedMemberAccess. Começando com o [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], o sinalizador ReflectionEmit não é exigido para emitir o código, a menos que são emitidos símbolos de depuração.Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)], the ReflectionEmit flag is no longer required to emit code, unless debug symbols are emitted. Para usar esse recurso, seu aplicativo deve ter como destino o [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] ou posterior.To use this feature, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] or later. Começando com o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], o sinalizador TypeInformation não é mais necessário para refletir nos tipos confidenciais e membros; o sinalizador foi marcado como obsoleto.Starting with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the TypeInformation flag is no longer required to reflect on nonpublic types and members; the flag has been marked obsolete. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o enumeração para inicializar uma nova instância do a classe que representa o direito de executar o acesso de membro restrito.The following example shows how to use the enumeration to initialize a new instance of the class that represents the right to perform restricted member access. Este exemplo é parte de um exemplo maior fornecido para a classe.This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. Para obter um exemplo que mostra como usar o sinalizador RestrictedMemberAccess com código de Internet, consulte [passo a passo: emitindo código em cenários de confiança parcial](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/walkthrough-emitting-code-in-partial-trust-scenarios.md).For an example that shows how to use the RestrictedMemberAccess flag with Internet code, see [Walkthrough: Emitting Code in Partial Trust Scenarios](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/walkthrough-emitting-code-in-partial-trust-scenarios.md). [!code-csharp[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/CS/reflectionpermission.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermission/VB/reflectionpermission.vb#8)]

.field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag MemberAccess = int32(2)

summary.span: Invocation operations on all members are allowed, regardless of grant set.

span.span: Invocation operations on all members are allowed, regardless of grant set.

summary.span: If this flag is not set, invocation operations are allowed only on visible members.

span.span: If this flag is not set, invocation operations are allowed only on visible members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag NoFlags = int32(0)

summary.span: Enumeration of types and members is allowed.

span.span: Enumeration of types and members is allowed.

summary.span: Invocation operations are allowed on visible types and members.

span.span: Invocation operations are allowed on visible types and members.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag ReflectionEmit = int32(4)

summary.span: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this flag is no longer required to emit code.

span.span: Beginning with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this flag is no longer required to emit code.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag RestrictedMemberAccess = int32(8)

summary.span: Restricted member access is provided for partially trusted code.

span.span: Restricted member access is provided for partially trusted code.

summary.span: Partially trusted code can access nonpublic types and members, but only if the grant set of the partially trusted code includes all permissions in the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types and members being accessed.

span.span: Partially trusted code can access nonpublic types and members, but only if the grant set of the partially trusted code includes all permissions in the grant set of the assembly that contains the nonpublic types and members being accessed.

summary.span: This flag is new in the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)].

span.span: This flag is new in the [!INCLUDE[net_v20SP1_short](~/includes/net-v20sp1-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Security.Permissions.ReflectionPermissionFlag TypeInformation = int32(1)

summary.span: No flags are necessary to enumerate types and members and to examine their metadata.

span.span: No flags are necessary to enumerate types and members and to examine their metadata.
